Master Cyphona:
The Unworldly Visitors Talisman is an item that we have created in order to help those who have worked for those of us who have united under banner of the Unworldly Visitors. The materials can be obtained through the missions that we provide. Bring us the materials, and we will make the talisman, You may also improve the performance of any Unworldly Visitors Talismans that you already have.
